1.definition: a writing (as a deed or lease) conveying information see also

2 a.definition: something (as a writing, photograph, or recording) that may be used as evidence

sub_terms.b: an official paper (as a license) relied on as the basis, proof, or support of something (as a right or privilege)[dÄ -kyə-ment] vt
to provide with exact references to authoritative supporting information

2.definition: to furnish (as a ship) with documents (as ship's papers)
